评论概述: Buying pants to fit your phone !
评论详情: Yep, that is how I approach buying pants and shorts these days. Dickies Men's Regular Straight Stretch Twill Cargo Pant , I have been buying for +20 years as a Tradesperson , The fabric blend is useful (quick wash/dry times), these pants come with 7 belt loops providing great even support. 8 total pockets ! The two slip pockets behind the cargo pockets fit my S22ultra w/ case . Wear/tear durability as workwear goes is pretty good at avg. pricepoint $30.0 The knees wear out the most , my solution for that is ultralight inexpensive foam knee pads from AWP , hardly notice they are there ,until i need them. The only negative I have is the zipper could be better quality and larger size mechanism. I would recommend this product to others.

I have an old pair of these that have served me well. The old button was metal with a thin flange that was easy to fasten. It was pressed onto the pants. The pants eventually wore out but the button never did. The new pants have a thick plastic button that is hard to fasten. It is sewn on. I guarantee the button will fail long before the pants wear out
Very satisfied with my purchase

评论概述: Perfect fit, multi convenient pockets including  quick access cell phone
评论详情: These "cargo pants" have a more refined look than most.  The material seems heavy duty, but doesn't look like the usual canvas texture but has a bit of a polished sheen.  They are not just the hard working "uniform" pants but can be worn for every day wear when "out and about".  I particularly like the placement of a quick access cell phone pocket behind the right side cargo pocket.The sizing both waist and length seems to be exact and the fit is comfortable.
Amazing pants by Dickies enough to be said.

I need to wear black pants for work and have bought the Dickies regular fit work cargo pant for years with a high degree of satisfaction.  I needed to purchase more but the pants that I normally buy were not available.  After several weeks of checking, I decided to buy these pants to see if they would be a suitable substitute.  Unfortunately they are most certainly not.  The waist is a bit small, the thigh and buttocks are too big and baggy, they are at least two inches too long, the pockets are fewer and less serviceable, etc.This purchase was a lesson learned and a real disappointment. I recommend that you find another brand if you find yourself in a situation similar to mine.
